message: Let's start fair. You get 10% and I take 90%.  We can negotiate later if you think it's unfair.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is my only offer - take it or leave it. Inflation is eating away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept less than 60%.  Inflation is hitting us both, but I'm willing to keep negotiating.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than I would get, even with the inflation. This is my final offer.
